write_up: Personally I’ve come to find what I like more than anything else with music is the feeling that I couldn’t find it anywhere else. Only Kilo Kish, at least to my knowledge, has found a personal pathway to making indie pop with the cloudy production style of left-field rap music, or at least only she has created an album full of it. She has an endearing and loving personality that comes through sweetly.
lyric: So hard to breathe and think of you / At the same time / Keep scrolling still my mind ain’t shutting off / like I remember last night
